verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> shadowing <S%H6767><s%> with wings <S%H3671><s%>, which is beyond <S%H5676><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%>:

That sendeth <S%H7971><s%> ambassadors <S%H6735><s%> by the sea <S%H3220><s%>, even in vessels <S%H3627><s%> of bulrushes <S%H1573><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%>, saying, Go <S%H3212><s%>, ye swift <S%H7031><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%>, to a nation <S%H1471><s%> scattered <S%H4900><s%> and peeled <S%H4178><s%>, to a people <S%H5971><s%> terrible <S%H3372><s%> from their beginning hitherto <S%H1973><s%>; a nation <S%H1471><s%> meted out <S%H6978><s%> and trodden down <S%H4001><s%>, whose land <S%H776><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> have spoiled <S%H958><s%>! scattered: or, outspread and polished meted: or, that meteth out and treadeth down: Heb. of line, line, and treading under foot have: or, despise

All ye inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%>, and dwellers <S%H7931><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>, see <S%H7200><s%> ye, when he lifteth up <S%H5375><s%> an ensign <S%H5251><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%>; and when he bloweth <S%H8628><s%> a trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> ye.

For so <S%H3541><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me, I will take my rest <S%H8252><s%>, and I will consider <S%H5027><s%> in my dwelling place <S%H4349><s%> like a clear <S%H6703><s%> heat <S%H2527><s%> upon herbs <S%H216><s%>, and like a cloud <S%H5645><s%> of dew <S%H2919><s%> in the heat <S%H2527><s%> of harvest <S%H7105><s%>. consider: or, regard my set dwelling upon: or, after rain

For afore <S%H6440><s%> the harvest <S%H7105><s%>, when the bud <S%H6525><s%> is perfect <S%H8552><s%>, and the sour grape <S%H1155><s%> is ripening <S%H1580><s%> in the flower <S%H5328><s%>, he shall both cut off <S%H3772><s%> the sprigs <S%H2150><s%> with pruning hooks <S%H4211><s%>, and take away <S%H5493><s%> and cut down <S%H8456><s%> the branches <S%H5189><s%>.

They shall be left <S%H5800><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> unto the fowls <S%H5861><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and to the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: and the fowls <S%H5861><s%> shall summer <S%H6972><s%> upon them, and all the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall winter <S%H2778><s%> upon them.

In that time <S%H6256><s%> shall the present <S%H7862><s%> be brought <S%H2986><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> of a people <S%H5971><s%> scattered <S%H4900><s%> and peeled <S%H4178><s%>, and from a people <S%H5971><s%> terrible <S%H3372><s%> from their beginning hitherto <S%H1973><s%>; a nation <S%H1471><s%> meted out <S%H6978><s%> and trodden under foot <S%H4001><s%>, whose land <S%H776><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> have spoiled <S%H958><s%>, to the place <S%H4725><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>. scattered: or, outspread and polished
